Function Documentation

GenericObject* get_main_icon_slot (  void   ) 
 

Finds the best selection for the icon in the notification area.

Returns:
The pointer to the main icon, or NULL if none needed
Note:
Our preferred choice is: Battery, UPS, AC_ADAPTER PDA and others should never be a main icon.
